text: I'm including a module reference path in a partial template to then load my header and footer for a blog. However, when attempting to get the appropriate styles to load, I've noticed that the module's stylesheet is not included in the network call.
```{% module "module_1xx" path="/Global Group/Header Global", label="Header Global" %}```

I'm seeing all the HTML, but no styles listed in the module are applied, as the CSS isn't loaded. I won't make presumptions, but I would wager the JS is also affected. How do I ensure the entire module is loaded, not just the HTML?
Tested the JS, it's loading. Only the module's CSS is missing.
